ovdesc.p: The properties of objects identified in UI.OBJECTS are defined in these records and a UI.OBJECTS record must exist prior to the creation of a UI.OBJ.PROPERTIES record.

desc.p: This field holds the property names of the given UI.OBJECT and would be used in the script to identify the objects.
Refers to the ID field of the UI Object. Must be the same as the UI.OBJECTS record that this is linked to.
